description: Deposit assets, let AI agents maximize your returns 24/7.

features.description: Harvest uses AI agents to automatically hunt opportunities on Solana. Connect your wallet and let our agents work 24/7 to find NFT flips, airdrops, liquid staking, and yield farming opportunities.

workspaces.title: NFT Flipper
workspaces.description: Our AI agents monitor Magic Eden and other marketplaces 24/7, identifying undervalued NFTs and executing profitable flips automatically.

compactMode.title: Airdrop Hunter
compactMode.description: Agents track upcoming airdrops, qualify your wallet for eligibility, and automatically claim tokens when they become available.

glance.title: Liquid Staking
glance.description: Auto-stake idle SOL on Marinade Finance for passive yield while maintaining optimal reserves.

splitView.title: Kamino Vaults
splitView.description: Deposit tokens into high-yield Kamino vaults. Agents find the best APY opportunities and rebalance across lending strategies.

title: Why
Harvest
community.description: Harvest combines cutting-edge AI with Solana's speed to deliver autonomous opportunity hunting that's transparent, efficient, and accessible to everyone.

freeAndOpenSource.title: Autonomous & Efficient
freeAndOpenSource.description: AI agents work 24/7 to hunt NFT flips, airdrops, bounties, and yield opportunities across Solana, so you don't have to.

simpleYetPowerful.title: Transparent On-Chain
simpleYetPowerful.description: Every action is recorded on Solana's blockchain. Track opportunities, verify transactions, and maintain full control of your assets.

privateAndAlwaysUpToDate.title: Multi-Strategy Access
privateAndAlwaysUpToDate.description: Access multiple earning strategies across Solana's ecosystem. Our agents continuously find and execute the best opportunities.

about.title: About Harvest
about.description: Harvest is an autonomous yield farming protocol on Solana. Our AI agents continuously monitor DeFi opportunities, optimize strategies, and execute trades to maximize your returns - all while you sleep.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
